resources.string: SmarterBit is an Xposed Framework module to enable additional functionality for the Fitbit Charge and Charge HR fitness trackers.\n\nUse SmarterBit to enable SMS notifications and control how and when you receive them!

1. Enable "Call Notifications" in the Fitbit app.
2. Choose your settings in SmarterBit.
3. Reboot your phone.
4. Enjoy!
Click to send a test notification to your Fitbit using the chosen settings.
Test notification sent - check your Fitbit!
If checked, you will receive SMS notifications on your Fitbit. "Call Notifications" must be enabled in the Fitbit app for SMS notifications to be received.
If checked, you will receive SMS notifications on your Fitbit only if your device screen is off.
If checked, you will only receive SMS notifications on your Fitbit if the phone is on silent.
Enter how you want your notification to appear, using %sender% and %message% as placeholders.
If checked, you will receive call notifications on your Fitbit. Overrides your setting in the Fitbit app.
If checked, you will only receive call notifications on your Fitbit if your device screen is off.
If checked, you will only receive call notifications on your Fitbit if your device is silent.
Hide caller ID and replace it with "Incoming Call".
SmarterBit is an Xposed Framework module for adding additional functionality to the Fitbit Charge and Charge HR fitness trackers.

SmarterBit is an unofficial modification to the Fitbit fitness tracker. Although no negative issues have been encountered, use of this app is at your own risk and neither Fitbit nor the developer of this app will be held accountable for any damage incurred.
